UpdateConvention.document:
mutation UpdateConvention($input: UpdateConventionInput!) {
  updateConvention(input: $input) {
    convention {
      id
      ...ConventionAdminConventionFields
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment ConventionAdminConventionFields on Convention {
  id
  accepting_proposals
  starts_at
  ends_at
  canceled
  name
  default_currency_code
  domain
  email_from
  email_mode
  event_mailing_list_domain
  location
  language
  timezone_name
  timezone_mode
  show_schedule
  show_event_list
  hidden
  maximum_tickets
  ticket_name
  ticketNamePlural
  clickwrap_agreement
  ticket_mode
  site_mode
  signup_mode
  signup_automation_mode
  signup_requests_open
  stripe_account_ready_to_charge
  favicon {
    id
    url
    __typename
  }
  open_graph_image {
    id
    url
    __typename
  }
  stripe_account {
    id
    email
    charges_enabled
    display_name
    __typename
  }
  signup_rounds {
    id
    start
    maximum_event_signups
    ranked_choice_order
    __typename
  }
  defaultLayout {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  cmsLayouts {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  rootPage {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  cmsPages {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  staff_positions {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  catch_all_staff_position {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

ConventionAdminConventionQuery.document:
query ConventionAdminConventionQuery {
  convention: conventionByRequestHost {
    id
    ...ConventionAdminConventionFields
    __typename
  }
  rootSite {
    id
    url
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

  id
  accepting_proposals
  starts_at
  ends_at
  canceled
  name
  default_currency_code
  domain
  email_from
  email_mode

  location
  language
  timezone_name
  timezone_mode
  show_schedule
  show_event_list
  hidden
  maximum_tickets
  ticket_name
  ticketNamePlural
  clickwrap_agreement
  ticket_mode
  site_mode
  signup_mode
  signup_automation_mode
  signup_requests_open
  stripe_account_ready_to_charge
  favicon {
    id
    url
    __typename
  }
  open_graph_image {
    id
    url
    __typename
  }
  stripe_account {
    id
    email
    charges_enabled
    display_name
    __typename
  }
  signup_rounds {
    id
    start
    maximum_event_signups
    ranked_choice_order
    __typename
  }
  defaultLayout {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  cmsLayouts {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  rootPage {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  cmsPages {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  staff_positions {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  catch_all_staff_position {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  __typename

EventAdminEventsQuery.document:
query EventAdminEventsQuery {
  currentAbility {
    can_override_maximum_event_provided_tickets
    can_manage_runs
    __typename
  }
  convention: conventionByRequestHost {
    id
    ...ConventionFields
    events(includeDropped: true) {
      id
      ...EventFields
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment ConventionFields on Convention {
  id
  name
  starts_at
  ends_at
  timezone_name
  timezone_mode
  event_mailing_list_domain
  site_mode
  signup_mode
  signup_automation_mode
  event_categories {
    id
    ...EventPageEventCategoryFields
    __typename
  }
  rooms {
    id
    ...RoomFields
    __typename
  }
  ticket_types {
    id
    ...TicketTypeFields
    __typename
  }
  ticket_name
  ticket_mode
  __typename
}
fragment EventPageEventCategoryFields on EventCategory {
  id
  name
  scheduling_ui
  default_color
  full_color
  signed_up_color
  teamMemberNamePlural
  team_member_name
  event_form {
    id
    ...CommonFormFields
    form_sections {
      id
      form_items {
        id
        admin_description
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonFormFields on Form {
  id
  title
  form_type
  form_sections {
    id
    ...CommonFormSectionFields
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonFormSectionFields on FormSection {
  id
  title
  position
  form_items {
    id
    ...CommonFormItemFields
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonFormItemFields on FormItem {
  id
  position
  identifier
  item_type
  rendered_properties
  default_value
  visibility
  writeability
  expose_in
  __typename
}
fragment RoomFields on Room {
  id
  name
  __typename
}
fragment TicketTypeFields on TicketType {
  id
  description
  maximum_event_provided_tickets
  __typename
}
fragment EventFields on Event {
  id
  title
  author
  description
  organization
  url
  con_mail_destination
  can_play_concurrently
  short_blurb
  participant_communications
  content_warnings
  email
  length_seconds
  status
  description_html
  current_user_form_item_viewer_role
  current_user_form_item_writer_role
  admin_notes
  event_category {
    id
    __typename
  }
  registration_policy {
    buckets {
      key
      name
      description
      minimum_slots
      preferred_slots
      total_slots
      slots_limited
      anything
      not_counted
      __typename
    }
    slots_limited
    prevent_no_preference_signups
    __typename
  }
  runs {
    id
    ...RunFields
    __typename
  }
  maximum_event_provided_tickets_overrides {
    id
    ...MaximumEventProvidedTicketsOverrideFields
    __typename
  }
  images {
    id
    byte_size
    content_type
    filename
    url
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment RunFields on Run {
  id
  starts_at
  schedule_note
  title_suffix
  room_names
  confirmed_signup_count
  not_counted_signup_count
  grouped_signup_counts {
    bucket_key
    count
    counted
    state
    team_member
    __typename
  }
  rooms {
    id
    ...RoomFields
    __typename
  }
  my_signups {
    id
    state
    __typename
  }
  my_signup_requests {
    id
    state
    __typename
  }
  my_signup_ranked_choices {
    id
    priority
    state
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment MaximumEventProvidedTicketsOverrideFields on MaximumEventProvidedTicketsOverride {
  ticket_type {
    id
    ...TicketTypeFields
    __typename
  }
  id
  override_value
  __typename
}

ScheduleGridConventionDataQuery.document:
query ScheduleGridConventionDataQuery {
  currentAbility {
    can_create_cms_partials
    __typename
  }
  convention: conventionByRequestHost {
    id
    blockPartial(name: PRE_SCHEDULE_TEXT) {
      id
      content
      content_html
      current_ability_can_update
      current_ability_can_delete
      __typename
    }
    ...CommonConventionData
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonConventionData on Convention {
  id
  name
  starts_at
  ends_at
  signup_mode
  signup_automation_mode
  site_mode
  timezone_name
  timezone_mode
  ticket_name
  ticket_mode
  event_categories {
    id
    name
    scheduling_ui
    default_color
    full_color
    signed_up_color
    team_member_name
    teamMemberNamePlural
    event_form {
      id
      form_sections {
        id
        form_items {
          id
          public_description
          default_value
          ...CommonFormItemFields
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonFormItemFields on FormItem {
  id
  position
  identifier
  item_type
  rendered_properties
  default_value
  visibility
  writeability
  expose_in
  __typename
}

query SignupAdminEventQuery($eventId: ID!) {
  convention: conventionByRequestHost {
    id
    ...CommonConventionData
    event(id: $eventId) {
      id
      title
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonConventionData on Convention {
  id
  name
  starts_at
  ends_at
  signup_mode
  signup_automation_mode
  site_mode
  timezone_name
  timezone_mode
  ticket_name
  ticket_mode
  event_categories {
    id
    name

    default_color
    full_color
    signed_up_color
    team_member_name
    teamMemberNamePlural
    event_form {
      id
      form_sections {
        id
        form_items {
          id
          public_description
          default_value
          ...CommonFormItemFields
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }

fragment CommonFormItemFields on FormItem {
  id

  identifier
  item_type
  rendered_properties

AdminSignupQuery.document:
query AdminSignupQuery($id: ID!) {
  convention: conventionByRequestHost {
    id
    ...CommonConventionData
    signup(id: $id) {
      id
      ...SignupFields
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  currentAbility {
    can_update_bucket_signup(signupId: $id)
    can_force_confirm_signup(signupId: $id)
    can_update_counted_signup(signupId: $id)
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonConventionData on Convention {
  id
  name
  starts_at
  ends_at
  signup_mode
  signup_automation_mode
  site_mode
  timezone_name
  timezone_mode
  ticket_name
  ticket_mode
  event_categories {
    id
    name
    scheduling_ui
    default_color
    full_color
    signed_up_color
    team_member_name
    teamMemberNamePlural
    event_form {
      id
      form_sections {
        id
        form_items {
          id
          public_description
          default_value
          ...CommonFormItemFields
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonFormItemFields on FormItem {
  id
  position
  identifier
  item_type
  rendered_properties
  default_value
  visibility
  writeability
  expose_in
  __typename
}
fragment SignupFields on Signup {
  id
  state
  counted
  bucket_key
  requested_bucket_key
  run {
    id
    title_suffix
    starts_at
    ends_at
    rooms {
      id
      name
      __typename
    }
    event {
      id
      title
      event_category {
        id
        team_member_name
        teamMemberNamePlural
        __typename
      }
      registration_policy {
        buckets {
          key
          name
          anything
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      team_members {
        id
        user_con_profile {
          id
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  user_con_profile {
    id
    name_without_nickname
    nickname
    birth_date
    email
    address
    city
    state
    zipcode
    country
    mobile_phone
    gravatar_enabled
    gravatar_url
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

RunHeaderRunInfoQuery.document:
query RunHeaderRunInfoQuery($eventId: ID!, $runId: ID!) {
  convention: conventionByRequestHost {
    id
    ...CommonConventionData
    event(id: $eventId) {
      id
      title
      length_seconds
      registration_policy {
        total_slots
        slots_limited
        buckets {
          name
          total_slots
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      run(id: $runId) {
        id
        starts_at
        title_suffix
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonConventionData on Convention {
  id
  name
  starts_at
  ends_at
  signup_mode
  signup_automation_mode
  site_mode
  timezone_name
  timezone_mode
  ticket_name
  ticket_mode
  event_categories {
    id
    name
    scheduling_ui
    default_color
    full_color
    signed_up_color
    team_member_name
    teamMemberNamePlural
    event_form {
      id
      form_sections {
        id
        form_items {
          id
          public_description
          default_value
          ...CommonFormItemFields
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonFormItemFields on FormItem {
  id
  position
  identifier
  item_type
  rendered_properties
  default_value
  visibility
  writeability
  expose_in
  __typename
}

MyProfileQuery.document:
query MyProfileQuery {
  convention: conventionByRequestHost {
    id
    name
    starts_at
    ends_at
    timezone_name
    timezone_mode
    my_profile {
      id
      email
      form_response_attrs_json
      can_have_bio
      gravatar_url
      gravatar_enabled
      bio
      show_nickname_in_bio
      bio_name
      bio_html
      current_user_form_item_viewer_role
      current_user_form_item_writer_role
      __typename
    }
    user_con_profile_form {
      id
      ...CommonFormFields
      form_sections {
        id
        form_items {
          id
          admin_description
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonFormFields on Form {
  id
  title
  form_type
  form_sections {
    id
    ...CommonFormSectionFields
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonFormSectionFields on FormSection {
  id
  title
  position
  form_items {
    id
    ...CommonFormItemFields
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment CommonFormItemFields on FormItem {
  id
  position
  identifier
  item_type
  rendered_properties
  default_value
  visibility
  writeability
  expose_in
  __typename
}

ConventionDisplayQuery.document:
query ConventionDisplayQuery($id: ID!) {
  convention: conventionById(id: $id) {
    id
    ...ConventionDisplayFields
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
fragment ConventionDisplayFields on Convention {
  id
  name
  starts_at
  ends_at
  canceled
  timezone_name
  timezone_mode
  domain
  site_mode
  ticket_mode
  show_event_list
  show_schedule
  email_from
  hidden
  language
  signup_rounds {
    id
    start
    maximum_event_signups
    __typename
  }
  organization {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

AppRootQuery.document:
query AppRootQuery {
  hasOauthApplications
  cmsParentByRequestHost {
    id
    cmsNavigationItems {
      id
      position
      title
      navigation_section {
        id
        __typename
      }
      page {
        id
        slug
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  currentAbility {
    can_read_schedule
    can_read_schedule_with_counts
    can_list_events
    can_read_user_con_profiles
    can_manage_conventions
    can_update_convention
    can_update_departments
    can_manage_email_routes
    can_update_event_categories
    can_read_event_proposals
    can_manage_runs
    can_manage_forms
    can_read_any_mailing_list
    can_update_notification_templates
    can_manage_oauth_applications
    can_read_reports
    can_manage_rooms
    can_manage_signups
    can_manage_any_cms_content
    can_manage_staff_positions
    can_read_orders
    can_manage_ticket_types
    can_read_user_activity_alerts
    can_read_organizations
    can_read_users
    __typename
  }
  currentUser {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  assumedIdentityFromProfile {
    id
    name_without_nickname
    __typename
  }
  convention: conventionByRequestHostIfPresent {
    id
    name
    domain
    default_currency_code
    accepting_proposals
    canceled
    language
    site_mode
    signup_mode
    signup_automation_mode
    starts_at
    stripe_account_id
    stripe_publishable_key
    ends_at
    ticket_mode
    timezone_name
    timezone_mode
    clickwrap_agreement
    tickets_available_for_purchase
    ticket_name
    ticketNamePlural
    ticket_types {
      id
      providing_products {
        id
        available
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    my_profile {
      id
      name
      email
      mobile_phone
      accepted_clickwrap_agreement
      name_without_nickname
      first_name
      last_name
      gravatar_enabled
      gravatar_url
      ticket {
        id
        __typename
      }
      current_pending_order {
        id
        order_entries {
          id
          quantity
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  rootSite {
    id
    site_name
    __typename
  }
  defaultCurrencyCode
  supportedCurrencyCodes
  __typename
}
